readability_reflection: I found both to be okay, but I find concatenation to be easier since the '+' sign is very visible to see where the strings connect.
comprehension_debugging: Personally, I find the {} brackets to be a bit more difficult to see compared to '+' when it comes to solving the tasks quickly. So interpolation forced me to look at the problem a bit longer than I would with concatenation.
preference_rationale: I would prefer concatenation because I find it more readable.
learning_curve: To be fair, I was more familiar with concatenation than interpolation, which is probably why I find it easier to understand.
suggestions_improvement: I can't think of any suggestions
